Reviews.Title: awesome product
Reviews.Author: Edmund Brobbey
Reviews.Content: package received in time and as per description. very good camera! upgraded from a t3i to the t5i and the difference is worlds apart! perfect for beginner photographers!

Reviews.Title: tickled beyond words
Reviews.Author: Flash Rob
Reviews.Content: This is by far the best bang for your hard-earned money. Great combination of glass. All actually fits in the bag!  Extras were of fair quality and seem to work just fine.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Jason
Reviews.Content: All pieces advertised arrived,  the card reader is different than the one pictured it is smaller a plus and reads the card with very good speed.  The glass filters were back ordered, shipping manifest was the only indication of them missing.  But they arrived just a couple of days later. The Camera body, all lenses, and accessories are new and in perfect condition.  Memory card is fast and camera can take pictures very quickly and record HD video with no issues.  Extra Battery holds charge and takes just as many pictures as the OEM.  The 2x telephoto lens works great on the 18-55mm lens, the edges of the image distorts on the 75-300mm  especially when all the way zoomed. The bag holds everything nice and neat and the tripod even has a carry bag for it which is nice. Placing the camera on the tripod and using the remote I am able to take many family pictures without having to run back and forth to the camera saves lots of time especially dealing with little ones and pets..Great product and price. Excellent shipping, I highly recommend to anyone looking to get a awesome DSLR camera with all the accessories needed for most shooting conditions.

Reviews.Title: GREAT GREAT GREAT
Reviews.Author: Jim B.
Reviews.Content: This is the most complete kit for the T5i I found on the net. I'm still trying to get familiar with the t5I and numerous accessories in the kit but am very happy with the purchase so far.  The two main lenses are Canon (very happy) while the 2.5 teli and .45 wide are aftermarket (which is ok with me).  The tripod is light weight and has two levels.  VERY GOOD VALUEThank you

Reviews.Title: Great produce for a great price
Reviews.Author: Martin Hinkson
Reviews.Content: Saved a lot of money for a lot more product. Great camera with extra accessories. You can't beat the price.

Reviews.Title: Excellent package,and business.
Reviews.Author: P. Perrino
Reviews.Content: I don't know what else I can add to the title. I bought this for my daughter, and she loves it. Hasn't stopped raving about it since I gave it to her. :) The shipping speed was unbelievable. Best service ever on Amazon, and believe me I've bought plenty of items here.

Reviews.Title: Loved it
Reviews.Author: Gift
Reviews.Content: This was a gift that was appreciated and loved very much - he was amazed at everything that came in the package and with the quality of this item

Reviews.Title: Great price, great value!
Reviews.Author: Jeff Wittmuss
Reviews.Content: Camera was exactly what we expected.  Have yet to find a better deal anywhere! We would definitely purchase from here again.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera but package a little iffy!
Reviews.Author: Mike Hammond
Reviews.Content: I purchased this package. The camera is awesome and you get a lot of things. Not sure these are all items that are really needed. Be careful, because I did not get everything as pictured. The SD card holder is just a plastic holder that will not hold up. The camera bag is cheap and the zipper broke after 3 days and I have already replaced it with a canon bag that is awesome. The card reader was not the one pictured. The tripod is okay, but I will be upgrading it also. The zoom lens is not an auto focus lens. Which means if you are going to use this lens, be prepared to use it with a tripod. If not, the shots can be inconsistent and blur very easily. Make no mistakes about it, this lens is known as the bargain zoom lens. Overall this is a good deal and it is a great camera. Good Starter bundle but you will need many upgrades. May be better off just purchasing the better stuff to start with.

Reviews.Title: Camera, 300mm Lens, Flash Okay.
Reviews.Author: Paulo Pinheiro
Reviews.Content: This whole deal is okay. The camera, the 300mm, the 55mm lenses, flash outstanding. Everything else, not too sure. Still 'good deal'

Reviews.Title: Great value for this item.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This is an exceptional product for the price. Camera and all lenses have all performed to my expectations. The only reason that I did not give it a 5 star rating was because of the tri-pod that was part of the package. I love the functionality of the tri-pod and everything about it, however the pin at the top that holds the mounting plate was really weak and broke after only a couple of uses. Everything else in the package arrived in good condition and has performed to my expectations and above. Great product,

Reviews.Title: Awesome Camera, and awesome kit.
Reviews.Author: Lexy
Reviews.Content: I've been using this camera for a couple of weeks now and it's an amazing upgrade. The quality of the pictures it takes is great and the features it includes is very nice compared to other cameras.

Reviews.Title: Perfect!
Reviews.Author: Cassie L.
Reviews.Content: The product was beautifully packaged and all brand new items. I opted for 2 day shipping from and it arrived in less than 24 hours !  So far the camera is exsactly what I wanted I love it!

Reviews.Title: HELL YES
Reviews.Author: navdeep
Reviews.Content: i'll never buy another company camera againexceeded all expectations.canon is the best company slr i've ownedalthough point and shoot camera is more so better with panasonic lumix (awesome wide screen lens and quality product in full metal frame)

Reviews.Title: Awesome Deal!!!
Reviews.Author: Vanessa
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my daughter because she wanted to learn photography.  Great package starter for an awesome price.  Would of been more expensive getting everything separately.  You can't even get a camera by itself at this price on most sites.  Shipping was fast.  The tripod was not as flimsy as most people have reviewed.  The flash and the remote control was a plus.  Loved the bag because it fits everything that came in this package.  This camera takes beautiful pictures as well.

Reviews.Title: Great Deal
Reviews.Author: Daphne Peake
Reviews.Content: This camer package is a great deal. I love the camera and lens becuase they are really original Canon manufactured. Other little accesories are useful but I have not really used them yet.

Reviews.Title: Loved it!
Reviews.Author: Ale
Reviews.Content: Loved the packaging! Everything works perfectly fine and it is very nice quality. Lenses are all Canon. The case is very durable and big, it fits everything in the package. It also arrived earlier which is always nice. Really in love with the camera, i've taken amazing photos!

Reviews.Title: Love my camera! This deal was the best I could find!
Reviews.Author: Bonnie Taylor
Reviews.Content: AWESOME camera - AWESOME deal!  Love all the extras that came with this.  I was able to get it up and running in no time.

Reviews.Title: Everything I wanted!
Reviews.Author: Erin Gardner
Reviews.Content: It felt like Christmas opening everything up in the box! It has everything I could possibly want! I especially like it because it is so much lighter than my Canon 30D. I took it for a week of rafting and Kayaking on the San Juan River and was really glad I'd made the purchase! I shot nearly 2,000 pictures and still had not used up the whole card that came with it! I did use the extra battery that came with it, though. Love it!

ProductInfo.Features:
KIT INCLUDES 16 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:
<1> Canon EOS Rebel T5i Digital SLR Camera & EF-S 18-55mm IS STM Lens + <2> Canon EF 75-300mm III Lens + <3> Transcend 32GB Class10 SD Card + <4> Precision Design DSLR300 Flash +
<5> Spare LP-E8 Battery + <6> Vivitar 58mm UV Glass Filter + <7> Additional Vivitar 58mm UV Glass Filter + <8> RC-6 Shutter Remote Control +
<9> Precision Design 2.5x Tele & .45x Wide Lens + <10> PD Digital SLR Camera Case + <11> Precision Design 58" Tripod + <12> Precision Design HDMI to Mini-HDMI Cable +
<13> Precision Design SDHC Memory Card Reader + <14> Precision Design 6pc Complete Cleaning Kit + <15> PD Memory Card Storage Wallet + <16> Precision Design LCD Monitor Screen Protectors
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS Rebel T5i Digital SLR Camera & EF-S 18-55mm IS STM Lens with EF 75-300mm III Lens + 32GB Card + Battery + Case + Flash + Tele/Wide Lenses + Tripod Kit
